title: Login Issue
description: User unable to log in due to incorrect credentials.

title: Payment Gateway Error
description: Payment not processing for certain users.

title: Slow Page Load Time
description: The main product catalog page is taking 10+ seconds to load.

title: Broken Image Link
description: A broken image link is displayed on the 'About Us' page.

title: Email Notification Failure
description: Order confirmation emails are not being sent to customers.

title: Incorrect Calculated Tax
description: Sales tax is being incorrectly calculated for customers in California.

title: Mobile App Crashing
description: iOS application crashes when accessing the user profile settings.

title: Missing Search Filter
description: Users need an option to filter products by size on the search results page.

title: Data Report Mismatch
description: The monthly revenue report does not match the data in the accounting database.

title: Broken Link in Footer
description: The 'Privacy Policy' link in the website footer leads to a 404 page.

title: Checkout Button Unresponsive
description: Users are unable to proceed from the cart page as the checkout button is unresponsive.

title: Typo in Heading
description: A typo ('Welcom' instead of 'Welcome') is found on the main user dashboard.

title: Subscription Cancellation Problem
description: The subscription cancellation form submits but the status does not update on the user's account.

title: API Rate Limit Exceeded
description: External integration is failing due to consistently hitting the API rate limit.

title: Wrong Currency Display
description: The price is displayed in USD for users located in the UK who should see GBP.

title: Server Outage - Database Connection
description: The production server experienced a brief outage due to a failed database connection.

title: Accessibility Issue: Keyboard Navigation
description: Keyboard-only navigation is broken on the checkout page, failing WCAG compliance.

title: Missing User Profile Field
description: The user's 'Phone Number' field is missing from the account editing page.

title: Search Functionality Returns Irrelevant Results
description: Searching for specific product names returns unrelated or no results at all.

title: Unwanted Browser Cache Behavior
description: The browser is aggressively caching dynamic user data, leading to stale information after refresh.

title: Security Vulnerability: XSS
description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability was found on the comments section input field.

title: Time Zone Display Error
description: All time stamps in the user activity log are displayed 5 hours behind the actual time zone.
